rows.label: qev087607_MSG0001
rows.name:
His Highness has made clear his feelings for our
people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087607_MSG0002
rows.name: If you will aid us in this hour of need, then I...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087607_MSG0003
rows.name: I will pledge my life in allegiance to you and your kind.[ST:wait ]
